SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.users

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.users.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Organizer
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a user within the Event Lottery application.

Each User has identifying information. The class also tracks the user's participation in events — including events they have joined, are waitlisted for, or are registered in.

This class implements Serializable

See Also:
